name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior PHP Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions using **PHP** frameworks such as **Laravel**, **Symfony**, and **CodeIgniter**. Proficient in developing robust **RESTful APIs** and managing databases with **MySQL**. Experienced in front-end technologies including **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3**, enabling full-stack development capabilities. Skilled in **Git** for version control and committed to Agile methodologies, ensuring effective collaboration and continuous delivery. Strong problem-solving abilities and excellent communication skills, with a proven track record of teamwork in complex projects.
Furthermore, I possess a deep understanding of CI/CD practices, effectively streamlining deployment processes. Passionate about leveraging technology to create impactful solutions while ensuring maintainability and compliance.
